fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Supplied: You have a hand size of 6.
- Exclusion: If you are in the game, the King will not be Outsider-aligned.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Secret Tunnel: Go to a room of your choice on top of a regular room this Night phase. [2 uses, 4 CD, Day]
- Supplies: Gain a non-special card of your choice. [4 uses, 1 CD]
- Sources: Check a player. Learn if they are truly Overlord. [1 use, UOR2]

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see that there are no King/Leader type roles.
